plugin-data.name: Twitter Cards
plugin-data.description: Протокол Twitter Cards дает возможность связывать свой контент с социальными сетями.

complete-this-field-with-the-twitter-sit: Complete this field with site's owner twitter username.
complete-this-field-with-the-twitter-car: Complete this field with the twitter card type for posts (default: summary)
Complete this field with the twitter card type for posts (default: summary_large_image)
